ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] You just sent me 2 klez worm
ygData.msgSnippet: Cause viruses spread in other ways than just plain email. Going without protection is asking for it. ... From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik [mailto:biltilie@muog.de]
ygData.messageBody:
Cause viruses spread in other ways than just plain email. Going without
protection is asking for it.



-----Original Message-----
From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik [mailto:biltilie@...]
Sent: den 25 oktober 2002 17:07
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] You just sent me 2 klez worm

On 25 Oct 2002 at 8:57, LAINE. Mikael (Nol) wrote:

> "there is a much cheaper way, than using any antivirus software: use a
> proper email program ... :-)"
>
> That's the dumbest thing i ever heard.

most of the latest viruses, actually wurms, use features of outlook
to spread themselves. some take the advantage of the active script
technologies embebbed into HTML parts.

a plain email program doesn't interpret those features.

i wonder what is so dumb about that?


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
